Constructor Summary
JavaChicken(double a, double b)

Constructor Detail

JavaChicken

public JavaChicken(double a,
                   double b)
Constructor for objects of class JavaChicken This will set the position of the JavaChicken object based on the input, and will set up the chicken for drawing. (Size is not a parameter of this constructor since it will be complicated to adjust the size of the parts of the JavaChicken object.)

Parameters:
a - x-coordinate of the chicken to be drawn (starts with the chicken's head)
b - y-coordinate of the chicken
Method Detail

Animates each part of the JavaChicken.

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d,
                 java.awt.geom.AffineTransform at)
This will be the method that will draw the shape indicated in the class name.

Specified by:
draw in interface DrawingObject
Parameters:
g2d - Graphics2D that will draw the JavaChicken.
at - AffineTransform that will draw the JavaChicken.
